issue.title: [CF 450] Druid's Nature's Grace Internal CD Track Bug
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Subsequently, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type (icon, group, or profile), and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

If you are experiencing errors that seem to be unrelated to icons, attaching a saved variables file will increase the likelihood of your problem being solved. Saved variables can be found in: "World of Warcraft/WTF/Account/<Account Name>/SavedVariables/TellMeWhen. lua". Screenshots can be especially helpful if your issue is hard to describe in words.

FAILURE TO COMPLY WITH THE ABOVE INSTRUCTIONS WILL RESULT IN YOUR TICKET BEING INVALIDATED.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Create a icon for Unit CD, enter: "Nature's Grace:60"
2. Always show clicked, maximum CD set to 10, show timer, show timer text.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I would expect When I proc Nature's Grace buff, this icon would be disappeared until the internal CD goes down to 10 sec then it shows. it would stay showing as long as the it is proc-able.

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
5.0, It wasn't a problem for the previous version.

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No. When its off cd, i proc it, the icon does not disappear, which it should be. However, when I do /tmw to configuration mode and /tmw again back to normal, it disappears and it appear when the CD reach to 10 sec. Then when I proc again, it does not disappear as it should be.

Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)
Here is the export. A few other icons all working, not to worry. Only this internal CD tracking is not working.
